!! newest RPos and Zpos

g = cos(theta + local%tri * (local%rhoc**2) * sin(theta))
     gp = -sin(theta + local%tri *(local%rhoc **2) * sin(theta)) &
          * 2 * local%rhoc * local%triprim * sin(theta)
	  
Rpos_delta_adjoint = local%rmaj + g * local%rhoc &
          + local%shift* local%rhoc* dr &
          + (g + local%rhoc * gp) * dr

Zpos = local%kappa * sin(theta) * local%rhoc &
           + local%kappa* sin(theta) *  dr &
           + 3*local%kapprim * sin(theta) * (local%rhoc**4) * dr &
           + 0.5 * (r - rhoc0)**2 * d2Z(i)
	   
           1        (0.10676153754832256,1.03098971227568743E-002)
           2  (-4.14193402277923881E-002,3.64143427994537555E-002)
           3  (3.72927807258514876E-002,-2.35668524224946010E-002)
           4 (-1.30222705690613786E-002,-6.73012345951104624E-002)
           5  (2.15777534137284212E-002,-8.79800541615073789E-002)
           6  (3.47221604770163146E-003,-1.49882890844954975E-002)
           7  (-2.38113650877183648E-002,4.63303095512948501E-002)
           8  (8.88912718778033795E-002,-5.66719490494007674E-002)
           9  (-7.55795155926441021E-003,4.74465154139923698E-003)
          10  (-1.93048688271079452E-004,1.60059030872559682E-002)
          11              (-5.1796242306136859,3.2730852777428461)
          12             (-0.0000000000000000,-0.0000000000000000)
          13             (-0.0000000000000000,-0.0000000000000000)
          14             (-0.0000000000000000,-0.0000000000000000)

!! now set rgeo = rmaj 
           1        (0.10654465754245974,1.12181620842845779E-002)
           2  (-4.90257143833807973E-002,4.11060165062652194E-002)

           7  (-2.45535826639632117E-002,4.62115098783386427E-002)
           8  (8.97673178588637571E-002,-5.58225377155921257E-002)
           9  (-7.61443021217156259E-003,2.02062735190320537E-002)
          10   (6.89539477671114576E-006,3.95383624221299235E-003)

          13             (-0.0000000000000000,-0.0000000000000000)
          14             (-0.0000000000000000,-0.0000000000000000)

g = cos(theta + asin(local%tri * (r**2)) * sin(theta))
     gp = -sin(theta + asin(local%tri *local%rhoc **2) * sin(theta)) &
           *(local%rhoc**2) * local%triprim * sin(theta)/(1-(local%tri *local%rhoc **2))


Rpos_delta_adjoint = local%rmaj + g * local%rhoc &
          -0.5* local%shift*(1- (local%rhoc)**2) &
          + local%shift* local%rhoc* dr &
          + (g + local%rhoc * gp) * dr

Zpos = local%kappa * sin(theta) * local%rhoc &
           + local%kappa* sin(theta) *  dr &
           - local%kapprim * sin(theta) * local%rhoc* (1-r**4) &
           + 0.5 * (r - rhoc0)**2 * d2Z(i)
	   
           1        (0.10676424101427844,1.01842616040335038E-002)
           2  (-4.15420845712748399E-002,3.65212000395295985E-002)
           3  (3.73947012244014304E-002,-2.36311148158783943E-002)
           4  (2.73710975811827968E-003,-8.06780167350227284E-002)
           5  (2.23607860181250923E-002,-8.72381028840146094E-002)
           6  (1.19311153548324017E-003,-1.45386936677074415E-002)
           7  (-2.41849919124860167E-002,4.62347001217236903E-002)
           8  (8.92808895490586896E-002,-5.58886488999872227E-002)
           9  (-7.57283156062528266E-003,2.02160614741968246E-002)
          10   (2.87625345875820367E-005,3.95191039489826371E-003)
          11              (-5.1937798852590458,3.2820105035991705)
          12             (-0.0000000000000000,-0.0000000000000000)
          13             (-0.0000000000000000,-0.0000000000000000)
          14             (-0.0000000000000000,-0.0000000000000000)


!!  !! linear expansion with arcsin	

           1        (0.10724667784584450,1.18335916692294853E-002)
           2  (-4.10046377318449007E-002,3.64630100021309800E-002)
           3  (3.69741477263035440E-002,-2.35564760440737757E-002)
